channel.title: [PI] Mage Book problem [PI]
channel.description:
Ok, well whomever replies will think I'm a newfag at Java coding.
On Project Insanity 474 - How would I make teleports in the Spell/Magic Book?
I don't get it? How do I put the coords for the teleport on the Spell/Magic Book..
Do I put for example..
[code]//lunar home teleport case 117048: c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0, "modern"); break; [/code]
I'd change the EDGEVILLE to like.. Let's say Varrock like this..
[code]c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.VARROCK_X, Config.VARROCK_Y, 0, "modern"); [/code]

item.title: [PI] Mage Book problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Please view the other thread.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Mage Book problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Same code, just different types of statements.

Teleports are either going to be an if-statement, or a switch statement for ActionButtons, while the tele tabs are going to be an if-statement, or a switch statement for ClickItem.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Mage Book problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote="#Haste, post:1, topic:364910"][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=461115.msg3373345#msg3373345 date=1287412188]
Try using numbers instead of letters.
[/quote]

So I’ll put like…

c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.3200_X, Config.3204_Y, 0, “modern”);[/quote]
WTF?

c.getPA().startTeleport(3200, 3204, 0, "modern");

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Mage Book problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Ok, well whomever replies will think I’m a newfag at Java coding.

On Project Insanity 474 - How would I make teleports in the Spell/Magic Book?

I don’t get it? How do I put the coords for the teleport on the Spell/Magic Book…

Do I put for example…

//lunar home teleport case 117048: c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y, 0, "modern"); break;

I’d change the EDGEVILLE to like… Let’s say Varrock like this…

c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.VARROCK_X, Config.VARROCK_Y, 0, "modern");

Read full topic
